metadata.name: Scheduled Task Creation Via Schtasks.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of scheduled tasks by user accounts via the "schtasks" utility.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\schtasks.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /create ')) AND NOT (contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('authori')) OR contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('autori'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of scheduled tasks by user accounts via the "schtasks" utility.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Administrative activity 2. Software installation Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/schtasks-create
